comments: This professor is amazing. He puts the notes for class online (you have to print them out though) so you can follow along and fill them in as he does on the board. He is a very interactive professor and always makes sure that you are understanding. GO TO OFFICE HOURS!!! He is very helpful one on one and will make you feel more confident in yourself

comments: Greatest math teacher that I have ever had. Easy to understand, gives a great review sheet for exams. Attendance is required but if you miss a class you will miss a lot of information. I highly recommend this professor, he\'s very inspiring.

stu_tags: RESPECTED  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Great professor! I HATE math, but he made it so understandable and I found myself actually looking forward to his class. He assigns hw for practice, but doesn\'t grade it. The hw is VERY similar to the tests though, so make sure you do it! He\'s truly passionate about math, but understands that not everyone loves it as much as he does. Take him!

stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Professor Ray is great! He\'s truly passionate about math. I LOVED his class, he made 75 minutes fly by(although I usually hate math). Only issue is that he sometimes moved too fast, but overall he was very clear and helpful. Doesn\'t just want his students to memorize steps but to understand the material. Gives credit where it\'s deserved.

stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  AMAZING LECTURES  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Brian Ray is hands down the most professional, most caring, and overall best professor for any class I have ever had. Calculus has proven to be an intensely difficult course, but he makes it manageable. he gives out note packets that you do, in full, in class and the tests are exactly like to them, and the optional homework. Take him.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: If you have to take Calculus as a Business school major, TAKE WITH THIS PROFESSOR. He reviews all of the basic algebra you need to know. Explains everything step-by-step. Supplements lectures with detailed worksheets. You can use homework sheets on quizzes. Tests are exactly as he prepares you for. Partial credit counts! Go to class and pass!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: IF YOU MUST TAKE A MATH FOR YOUR CORE, TAKE BRIAN RAY. an amazing teacher, tests are set up so you can choose problems you know how to do, and can skip ones you dont. requires you to do homework, grades on accuracy. Tests mirror homework, so as long as you do homework you don\'t have to study, but still has study guides everything is explained well

comments: Mr. Ray is incompetent when it comes to making tests. One problem winds up being 20 points which if you get wrong will bring down your grade on that test dramatically. Talks to you like your a 5 year old. The class is very easy but the way he makes his tests are so hard that its not even worth taking.

comments: Mr. Ray is sooo nice. He will explain things over to you if you are bad at math, such as myself. Gives out lots of hw for extra points and practice. Must come to class if you do not already know this stuff.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Brian is the man. If you need a math gened then take this class. Not only is the class material easy its practical. You will learn useful information and it\'s all very straight forward. Brian is clear cut in what he expects and the way he teaches. He teaches math the way it should be taught. Very nice guy and should take this class.
